Docs.summary: The System.Resources namespace provides classes and interfaces that allow developers to create, store, and manage various culture-specific resources used in an application. One of the most important classes of the System.Resources namespace is the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class allows the user to access and control resources stored in the main assembly or in resource satellite assemblies. Use the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject%2A> and <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A> methods to retrieve culture-specific objects and strings.
